import useFetch from "../../hooks/useFetch"; import "./featured.css"; const Featured = () => { const {data, loading, error} = useFetch(`${process.env.REACT_APP_BASE_URL}/hotels/countByCity?cities=berlin,madrid,london`) return (
{loading ? ("Loading please wait" ) : (<>

); }; export default Featured;
